LOANSHARKS FEED ON THE DESPERATION OF PEOPLE AND THE HIGH INTEREST RATES THEY DEMAND TRAP PEOPLE IN VICIOUS CYCLES OF DEBT. I HOPE THAT BY OFFERING A HAND UP, NOT A HANDOUT, I CAN DO MY PART TO HELP MY FELLOW MAN.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I think I will get my money back.
lender.occupational_info: I like to travel.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am no longer loaning money unless I can find loans with a Portfolio yield that is fair. I believe kivas field partners are making an exorbitant return on the investment of our money. Ive seen rates as high as 57.8%, some are much less like 19% but I think that these amounts are usurious and put are putting an unfair burden on people who cannot afford it. It is making the administrators of our money rich and keeping the ones we wanted to help in a cycle of debt to the banks. I would never take a loan or a credit card with even a 19% APR myself and I wouldnt want anyone else to have to either.

lender.name: ellen

These recordings are used for legal purposes or just to make sure the customer had a pleasant experience.

lender.occupational_info: It all comes down to communication -- whatever the medium.

lender.occupational_info: I provide healthcare to the sick.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: it is a good thing to do

lender.name: Jag
lender.loan_because: I feel good that I can do a little bit for people who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I advise electric utilities to provide reliable electricity to people

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I don't need another iPod, video game, DVD or meal out. This is a great opportuntiy to help. Thank you Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I help patients become more involed in their healthcare and provide opportunies for them to communicate more effectively with their doctor.

lender.name: Aungsan
lender.loan_because: I want to.
lender.occupational_info: basically I put workers in airplanes to fly and serve passengers and take them to wehere they need to be. :P

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: After rolling over my portfolio of micro loans as they are paid off into new loans I've realized they have provided over $3,000 in capital to hard working families seeking to improve their lives while strengthening the communities they live in. I have now set a new goal of reaching the $10,000 level, something I would never have dreamed of doing when I started this journey.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired after 50 years of working in industry, 45 years as a mechanical engineer. My wife Judy and and I are now working on our "Bucket LIst" to enjoy our retirement years together. My hobby combines street rodding, photography and writing articles for the Mass Cruisers Auto Club while Judy enjoys sewing, interior decorating and a renewed interest in photgraphy with her own digital camera and printer.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I saw the story of Kiva, on a recent PBS broadcast. I just had to do this, to help in a small, but important way to work for a better life for another person and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the safety and security of a very large high rise residential building in a large midwestern city. it is challenging and fun to interact with the 135 families that live here.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I like to support people who have initiative and drive but lack the resources to get their ideas off of the ground.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to people so they can buy houses

lender.name: Selina
lender.loan_because: I wish to help out the world

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Our family has decided rather than gifts to each other each year we can give a gift of a loan to someone who can use it. I feel it is a way to help others rather than accumulate more stuff.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor who cares for elderly people when they are ill.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have travelled in the countries where Kiva's loans are made and understand the need as well as the results of so many successes.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help!
lender.occupational_info: I design telephone communications equipment.

lender.name: Kimi
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to live in America and I believe in helping others to achieve their dreams of owning their own business as a pathway to self-fullfillment.
lender.occupational_info: I design complex infrastructure systems for the world's largest corporations.

lender.name: Pierre-Yves
lender.loan_because: I lived in a third-world country (Haiti) for 7 years when i was young and I know how bad it is. and this is a brilliant solution.
lender.occupational_info: i work in online advertising, no not the spam or pop-ups industry, the "clean" one!

lender.name: Treasa
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Pastry Chef in San Francisco. I like to create recipes based on seasonal, local ingredients, and love to educate myself on various ingredients indigenous to areas all over the world

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: "If you treat a man as he is, he will stay as he is; but, if you treat him as if he were what he ought to be, and could be, he will become that bigger and better man."

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: I HOPE IT CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE
lender.occupational_info: LOTS OF TYPING

lender.name: Bill & Pat
lender.loan_because: My wife and I think that this is a wonderful program to help people help themselves. In the Kiva program we know that the people that need the help will receive the money that we loan for them to use for their own and their family's benefit. As the money is paid back we will loan it out again.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Avionics shop manager. We Work on general aviation aircraft (corporate and private). Avionics involves the repair and installation of aircraft electronics systems, such as communication radios, navigation and GPS equipment, audio systems, flight control systems, etc. My wife stays at home and watches over our many animals (cows, horses, chickens, goats, dogs, cats and more).

lender.name: Valan
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Grain Elevator, and Livestock feed production. Also do crop applications of fertilizer and chemicals.
